Comment: Number of records in the SACCR exposure file cannot be less than 50,000
SACCR exposure file size is at most 30% change day over day
CALC_TYPE = "OSFI-BFG-NEW" or file may not be loaded correctly
NOTIONAL is a non-empty attribute for GMI and GFI trades
Finance file size is at most 20% change month over month
Number of records in finance data cannot be less than 150000
